text: Pierre Nanterme (7 September 1959https://www.google.com/search?q=Pierre+Nanterme+7+septembre+1959&client;=ms- android-samsung- ss&prmd;=inv&source;=lnms&tbm;=bks&sa;=X&ved;=2ahUKEwii6ei4t5jgAhUQM- wKHcioBZ4Q_AUoBHoECAwQBA&cshid;=1548951907719&biw;=412&bih;=652 â€“ 31 January 2019) was a French business executive. He was the chairman and chief executive officer (CEO) of Accenture. Nanterme was diagnosed with colon cancer in 2016. Nanterme died on 31 January 2019 at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:French businesspeople
title: Pierre Nanterme
